"Let's run for it!" you shout. Dr. Vivaldi scans the bubbling fields of clay. "Ithink I know the best direction to run, so I'll gofirst, and you follow." You can just barely hear hervoice. "Remember to hold your breath, and don'tforget to . . . " Her voice is cut off by morethunder as she races across the white clay. What was she trying to tell you not to forget? No more time to think! You take a deep breathand run!
